channel.title: 667 Protocol
channel.description:
I am trying to edit the server Matrix. I do not want it to just be another "leeched" server. and we will not be releasing it soon. maybe in 4 more weeks. however i am having the following problem.
My coding friend can connect and load the server. However My other friend cannot and it states "Loading Please Wait 1%" and does not continue to load. Someone told me it was my "protocol" but i do not know how to fix it. I want my friend to play so he can tell us what to add and shit. If you might know the problem please comment or message me, i promise after i set up a paypal im willing to give a good amount or what ever. I need help really bad. Please Comment or even PM me, and i have Team Viewer so maybe you can help me through there. Thank you... Alot
